title: How do I open my browser in incognito mode?
content:
To open the browser’s incognito or “private browsing” mode, please follow the instructions below:
Chrome
Safari
Firefox
Microsoft Edge
To open an Incognito window in Chrome:
Open Chrome and click on
More
(three dots) in the upper right corner of your screen
Select
New Incognito Window
Alternatively, you can use the keyboard shortcut
Command+Shift+N
on Mac or
Ctrl+Shift+N
on Windows.
To open a private window in Safari:
Choose
File
Select
New Private Window
To open a private window in Firefox:
Go to the Firefox Menu
Select
New Private Window
To start private browsing in Microsoft Edge:
Open Microsoft Edge and click on
More
(three dots) in the upper right corner of your screen
Select
New InPrivate Window
